channel.title: Master-thesis on Jimmie West
channel.description: Recent content in Master-thesis on Jimmie West

item.title: Master thesis
item.description: I did my master thesis at a company called Donya Labs (aquired by Microsoft in 2017). The goal of the project was to look into how Simplygon could take advantage of the parallel processing power of GPUs in order to speed up normal/color map baking. The result of the work can be found here: GPU-optimized generation of normal and color maps
